name: Save the Llama
description:
Aliens are coming to steal the world's last llamas! Assemble advanced towers from old farm equipment, mechanize the landscape, and erect an impenetrable perimeter to defend your herd. Construct your towers on moving platforms and orchestrate their position and timing to defeat waves of enemies. The world is depending on you!

Features

  • An assortment of moving mechanisms to build upon for players to experiment with to their strategic delight.
  • Six unique upgrade-able towers to build your defenses from.
  • 10 enemy types with different abilities to defeat.
  • Perks to improve and specialize your play style.
  • 16 unique levels to master
  • Playful acapella sound effects and voice acting.
  • Full save and load, never lose progress when you need to step away.
  • Fast forward, slow, and pause time as you see fit.
